TopicTitle: How do you close the "Review stored data" window?

Articles.Content:
How do you close the "Review stored data" window without having to click on "Keep experiment" for every experiment stored? Gets tiresome when you have 20+ experiments.

I don't see a "close" button. I discovered that switching to another spacecraft and back closes the darn window - but is there a simpler way?

 

Thanks
Go EVA and board again. There's been a longstanding feedback request with the devs to add a "keep all" button -- but it hasn't happened yet.
Don't you just click through the keep data button a few times? I've never had this problem?

2 hours ago, EpicSpaceTroll139 said:

Don't you just click through the keep data button a few times? I've never had this problem?

Sure, you can do that.  But when there's a lot of data in there (like 20... or 40... or 80...) it gets extraordinarily tedious, which was what the OP was talking about.
Ha! Pansies. When I load up my MPL the first time it's more like 400.
